kanzlei_content.p1: In a world of complex, diverse and fast changing business environments, IRAZ offers efficient solutions for private and corporate clients, with a particular focus on cross-border activities in Switzerland, Spain, Romania, Hungary, Finland and South America.
kanzlei_content.p2: Our multinational team of lawyers and selected consultants complement each other in the best possible way, allowing us to deliver high-quality service that you deserve, including legal advice and legal representation in Switzerland and our target countries. Our lawyers are qualified in Switzerland and at least an additional EU-country.
kanzlei_content.p3: Centrally located near Bellevue, IRAZ is within walking distance from the Stadelhofen train station and lake Zurich. Next to our headquarter in Zurich, our lawyers maintain law firms in Barcelona, Spain, Cluj-Napoca, Romania and Szeged, Hungary.

daniela.bio:
Ms. Costea has more than 25 years of experience in legal professions, from 1994 to 2004 as a public prosecutor in Romania, and subsequently as an attorney-at-law in Switzerland and Romania: from 2006 to 2015 in a law firm in Winterthur, from 2015 to 2019 as a partner in a law firm in Zurich, and since January 2020 as a partner at Internationale Rechtsanwälte Zürich. Since 2004, she has also operated her own law office in Cluj-Napoca, Romania.

Ms. Costea has achieved significant successes before the European Court of Human Rights in Strasbourg, as legal representative of a renowned Swiss pharmaceutical company based in Basel, in several company formations involving real estate acquisitions between Romania and Switzerland, as well as in highly complex inheritance proceedings between Switzerland and Romania.

Ms. Costea represents Swiss and Romanian clients before all courts and authorities, both in Switzerland and in Romania.

With her doctoral dissertation entitled “EU Acquis relating to Freedom of Movement”, Ms. Costea was awarded the doctoral degree in 2020.

Legal advice and representation under Swiss law

  • Immigration law (obtaining residence permits and settlement permits)
  • Company law, company formation, business establishment
  • Family law (marital agreements, separation and divorce agreements)
  • Inheritance law
  • Employment law
  • Insurance law
  • Criminal law
  • Arbitration
  • Recognition of Romanian judgments in Switzerland and Swiss judgments in Romania
  • Representation before all authorities and courts

Legal advice and representation under Romanian law

  • Civil law
  • Commercial law
  • Criminal law
  • Representation before all Romanian courts
  • Preparation and review of legal documents (contracts, powers of attorney)

Legal advice and representation before the European Court of Human Rights in Strasbourg.

Languages

  • German
  • English
  • Romanian (native)
